‎-她觉得自己要淹死了

"I don't know what's going on. I don't know what this means."

and then they were keeping her alive to get Baby out in time.

‎为了让宝宝如期出生

He was a month early.
-You mentioned preemie. -Yes.
-So it's very spot on. -[Tyler] I see.
And she puts a lot of acceptance, so long as the baby was to live.

I'm so glad that he made it.

‎-他很可爱

Do we know of a situation along those lines?
-Yes. -[Tyler] Okay.

‎说说你们能说的事
‎与此有什么关系呢？

-That wasn't the case. -[woman] It really hurt.
We see pictures on Facebook and stuff. So that's how we connect.

‎我们就是这样

translation.en: That won't always be the case.
I wanna emphasize this.
That's going to change.
She wants these people in her life that were important

translation.en: to be able to have a relationship with this kid,
but it may not be the case now, so just--

translation.en: -[friend 3] She knows that? -[Tyler] Absolutely.
translation.zh:
‎-她知道这个情况？
‎-对 没错

translation.en: [friend 3] Good.
That for me is one of the most important messages of this reading.

‎这对我来说也是此次读心中
‎最重要的信息之一

translation.en: -Just that. -That's what we wanted.
translation.zh:
‎-就是这样
‎-这也是我们想要的

translation.en: That's what we asked for.
Absolutely. I do suspect, um, there's something with this.

translation.en: [smacks lips] Okay, there.
There, there, Okay.
She is having me talk about, um, Rich. Rich, Rich, Rich, Rich, Rich. Who's Rich?

translation.en: -Richie. -[Tyler] It's a name.
-Oh, Richie! -[Tyler] Who's Richie?
[woman] She didn't meet my second child. I was pregnant with him

‎她没见过我的第二个孩子
‎我当时怀着他

translation.en: when she passed.
That's where we're going. She's having me highlight this little one,
translation.zh:
‎原来是说的这个
‎她让我着重谈谈这个小家伙

translation.en: and I feel like she's making a big point to acknowledge him and his birth.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉到她在着重强调他和他的出生

translation.en: I'm putting a lot of love around that, and I feel like it's big.
translation.zh: ‎很有爱 我感觉到这能量很强大

translation.en: I had a complication after my epidural.
translation.zh: ‎我在硬膜外麻醉后出现了并发症

translation.en: -[Tyler] Right. -And I thought I was gonna die. [chuckles]
But I felt her.
That's the message with this. By bringing him up,

‎信息就是说的这个 ‎提到他
‎就确认了她当时参与了这个过程

translation.en: it was validation that she was part of that process.
translation.zh:
‎提到他
‎就确认了她当时参与了这个过程

translation.en: Yeah. I thought about her the whole time when I was in there.
translation.zh:
‎对 整个过程中
‎我在手术室里 我一直在想她

translation.en: She knew this, so please know there's no accidents.

‎她知道 ‎所以要知道
‎他们提到的事里没有意外

translation.en: -She sacrificed for his health. -[Tyler] She was a big part of it.
translation.zh:
‎-她为他的健康作出牺牲
‎-她大大参与了这件事

translation.en: It shows that she was involved on the other side,

‎这表明她即便在另一个世界
‎依然还是参与其中

translation.en: and the people that loved her.
-That didn't end just because she passed. -[friend 2] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这并不因为她的去世而结束
‎-对

translation.en: -Okay. -[Tyler] How she's honored moving forward.

‎-好的
‎-之后大家也都很尊重她

translation.en: -She seems all good. -[woman] Yeah.
And very proud.
And just so connected to her sisters, is really how it feels more than anything.

‎和她的姐妹们关系很好
‎这是最强烈的感觉

translation.en: I can't believe everything you're telling us.
Aw, I'm so glad. I know it's pretty cool.

‎-我以为会讲两三件事…
‎-有一点

‎-对了…
‎-就像你在读我们的日记似的

translation.en: -Yes. -[laughing]
This has been an amazing girls' night.

-We really feel like you brought Lauren. -[friend 3] We got our Lauren.

‎-我们的劳伦来了

translation.en: Oh, I'm so glad.
Today, it felt like Lauren was sitting there with us.

‎今天感觉就像
‎劳伦和我们坐在一起似的

-We're gonna walk through this. -She was here.

‎-我们得好好消化
‎-就像她来了似的

translation.en: Yeah. Everything he said was spot on.

[Heather] Yeah?
That was so good. It was a group of four people.
-[Heather] Yeah? -[Tyler] Yeah.
It was their friend who passed, who was a female

translation.en: who had passed away when she was pregnant.
She died giving birth to her baby.
-So the baby, the baby lived. -That's what you said!
-That's exactly what you said. -[Tyler] Yes, it's nuts.
translation.zh:
‎-你之前就是这么说的啊
‎-对 很离谱

translation.en: [Heather gasps] She's… wow. Gosh.
[Tyler] That was so special.
[Heather] Yeah.
[Tyler] It was a lot to digest.
-[Heather] Yeah. -[Tyler] For me and for them.
translation.zh:
‎-有许多需要消化
‎-对 ‎-对我 对她们 都是如此
‎-不容易啊

translation.en: [Heather] It's not easy. It's more the after.
translation.zh:
‎-对我 对她们 都是如此
‎-不容易啊 ‎之后更不容易

translation.en: It's more going home now.
It's where my challenge kind of begins.
-Yeah. -Letting it go, which, you know…

‎-对
‎-要放开这些东西 你也知道…

I have to like sacrifice some of my own existence, weirdly,

translation.en: and it, like, stays with the people.
And then as days go on, it kind of comes back to me,

‎然后随着日子一天天过去
‎它会回到我这里

translation.en: but I feel like I left a part of myself there.
translation.zh:
‎但是我感觉就像
‎把自己的一部分留在了那里

translation.en: It's really weird.
Okay, so, I'm gonna put these in here for you.

Okay.

No. He's gonna know I call him "Daddy" now.

‎我说：“是 先生”

translation.en: Tyler.
[Tyler] 'Kay.
-[Theresa] Ay, ay, ay. -Now he's gonna know.

‎-哎呀
‎-嗯 这下子他要知道了

translation.en: Cat's out of the bag.
It's not my fault I have a hot dentist.

‎不过我妈确实是我最好的朋友

translation.en: and we have a straightforward relationship.
My mom gets me. I get her. We're beyond the point of cordiality. Um, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎我妈妈懂我 我也懂她
‎我们关系非常好 嗯

translation.en: -Oh my God. -Yeah. Oh man.
What's for dinner?
-What's for dinner? -Am I supposed to read your mind? [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-晚饭吃什么？
‎-要我读你的心吗？

Any good I do, I really believe comes from the strength that she gave me.
translation.zh:
‎我做的好事
‎我觉得都是来自她给我的力量

translation.en: So, yeah.
[interviewer] Have you ever tried to read your mom?
Yea… Yeah. Yeah.
I spontaneously read my mom when I was a teenager one day.
translation.zh:
‎我十几岁的时候
‎有一天不由自主地读了我妈妈

translation.en: I had a name come through,
and I asked her who it was,
and she just burst into tears crying
because the person I had identified
had done something really bad to my mom.
She's never told me the extent of what that was.
So it's a mystery.
I think that was really a turning point to my mom's understanding of my ability,
translation.zh:
‎我想这是
‎我妈开始理解我能力的转折点

translation.en: that she had kept secrets to protect me,
translation.zh: ‎她一直保守秘密 为了保护我

translation.en: and I was still capable of seeing through some things.
translation.zh: ‎而我还是能够看到一些东西

translation.en: I thought that was definitely a turning point.
For sure.
But yeah, it goes to show as a medium,
translation.zh: ‎不过是的 作为灵媒上节目

translation.en: I can see some pieces of information,
but often not the whole picture.
-[man] Ready? -[Tyler] Yep.
Sorry. I just don't know my own strength.

translation.en: Clint is my partner of four-and-a-half years.

‎克林特是我的伴侣
‎我们在一起已经四年半了

He would tell you a different story, but he tweeted me.
translation.zh: ‎他的说法会不一样 ‎但事实是他给我发了推特

translation.en: He slid into those DM's.
Gays, man. They're persistent.
And don't you forget it.
I think coming from a small town in Georgia, I feel like he just,
translation.zh: ‎他来自乔治亚州中部的一个小镇 ‎我觉得他特别想找一个心灵相通的人

translation.en: he really wanted somebody to relate to. I had an immediate connection with him.

I've hit a brick wall there, and nobody wants to talk.

‎我在这方面碰过钉子
‎没人想谈这个问题

translation.en: Yeah.
The majority of the research that I was doing back when this all started
translation.zh: ‎我开始的时候所作研究的主要部分

translation.en: was with the family DNA research
-[Tyler] Correct. -We didn't know what we were looking for.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-我们当时不知道要找什么

translation.en: At first, you did the DNA test. It came back different than you thought.
translation.zh:
‎先是你做了DNA检测
‎结果与你原先以为的不同

translation.en: But when your mom did it was when, like--
-[Tyler] We really realized. -Shit got weird.
translation.zh:
‎-我们就发现了
‎-情况变得太奇怪了

translation.en: Whoops!
DNA don't lie.
It was only two years ago that my mom found out her mother wasn't her mother.
translation.zh:
‎两年前我妈妈才发现
‎她母亲并非她的生母

translation.en: Her father wasn't her father.
The siblings she had, she wasn't related to,
translation.zh: ‎她的兄弟姐妹与她没有血缘关系

translation.en: and we were just stunned. We were in complete shock.
On every level here, there's mystery.
Absolutely. Yeah.
You'd think as a medium, I should be able to call everybody on the other side
translation.zh:
‎我是灵媒 ‎你以为我可以
‎给另一个世界的人打电话

translation.en: and figure out what happened to my mom.
But every step of the way, I've hit a wall.
I'm too biased and connected to the situation to be emotionally objective,
translation.zh:
‎我倾向性太强 与事件关系太紧密
‎无法在情绪上做到客观

translation.en: and because of that, I need help finding the answers we're seeking.
translation.zh: ‎因此我需要得到帮助以寻找答案

translation.en: I wanna know how exactly Stella obtained my mom,
translation.zh:
‎我想知道
‎斯黛拉具体是怎么得到我妈妈的

translation.en: and what my mom's biological mother thought was happening.
translation.zh: ‎以及我妈妈的生母当时心里的想法

translation.en: Did she know?
Did she think that my mom was going to somebody else?
translation.zh: ‎她知道我妈妈会去别人那里吗？

translation.en: How did that happen?
I have a right to know, and I'm not gonna let anyone stop me.
translation.zh:
‎我有权利知道
‎我不会让任何人阻止我

translation.en: We just have to figure out who can help.
translation.zh: ‎我们只需要想明白谁能帮上忙就行

translation.en: Yeah. I just wonder why, like…
This is so convoluted.

-[Theresa] Where? For who? -Right there. See?
translation.zh:
‎-哪里？给谁贴？
‎-那边 看见了吗？

translation.en: You. We'll put them on the back, so people are warned.
translation.zh: ‎给你 贴在后面 提醒一下别人

translation.en: [Theresa] You're hilarious.
[Theresa] I predict you're going to have an amazing reading today.
translation.zh: ‎我预测你今天会读得非常棒

translation.en: I sure hope so.
I did have someone come through earlier who passed away in a fire.

‎之前确实有
‎死于火灾的人的信息传过来

translation.en: What?
[Tyler] I could tell this was a male. I'd be interested to see who this is.

translation.en: [Theresa] Come on. Buck up. It's gonna be okay.

Oh!
I'm Tyler.
-What's up? -Nice to meet you.
-Bring it in. COVID or not. -Aw. Lovely to meet you.

‎-来抱抱 不管有没有新冠
‎-噢 幸会

translation.en: -Good to meet you too. -Thank you for having me.
-Absolutely. -This is so cool.
-[man] Welcome to my world. -Amazing.
-What's your name? -Cals.
-Cals. Nice to meet you. -You look just like…
translation.zh:
‎-卡尔斯 很高兴认识你
‎-你很像…

translation.en: -Never mind. -[Tyler] Yeah?
-Macaulay Culkin. I get him a lot. -[Cals laughs] I wasn't sure.
translation.zh:
‎-麦考利·卡尔金 经常有人说我像他
‎-之前我也不太确定

translation.zh:
‎-这里很不错 这个录音室叫什么？
‎-对

It was named after Outkast's album.

translation.en: Lot of history has been made in this studio.
[Tyler] I believe it.
-Curious to see what comes through. -Let's do it.

‎-我们开始吧

translation.en: -Do you any have objects? -[Cals] Yeah.
You can whip 'em out now.
[Tyler] Amazing. You can put it right there.
I'm gonna center myself, take deep breaths.

translation.en: -[Cals] Do your thing. -We will see what comes in.
translation.zh:
‎-你来吧
‎-然后我们看会有什么样的信息传来

translation.en: [Tyler sighs] Okay.
All right.
-We're gonna talk about living people. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我们先谈一下活着的人
‎-好的

translation.en: Um, think, think biological family.
There's gonna be something that comes up pertaining to someone having a difficulty breathing,
translation.zh: ‎会提到在呼吸方面有困难的人

translation.en: either finding a spot on an X-ray of our lungs.

translation.en: There's been either a conversation around it,
but it doesn't feel like it's been taken as seriously as it should--
[Cals] My mother.
-In the long run. -She said she had a spot on her lung.
translation.zh:
‎-长久以来没有严肃对待
‎-她说她肺部有一个斑点

translation.en: -But that's… -Yeah.
How did you know that? Like, would it… You felt the spot? Or like…
translation.zh:
‎你怎么知道的？
‎你感觉到了斑点吗？还是…

translation.en: [Tyler] I see it visually.
Uh, I had a collapsed lung earlier this year.
It does come through similar in the sense of seeing an X-ray and seeing a spot.

‎不过都是X光片上有斑点
‎从这个角度说确实很像

translation.en: In early 2020, I had actually had a collapsed lung.
It was resting on my heart.
While I don't think my ability caused that,
translation.zh: ‎虽然我并不认为这是我的能力导致的

translation.en: I have a lot of physical effects from readings, and they put me through it.
translation.zh:
‎但读心对我产生了许多身体上的影响
‎对我造成了很大的压力

translation.en: So I have no idea how this will affect my body in the long run.
translation.zh:
‎所以我不知道这会对我的身体
‎造成什么样的长期影响

translation.en: Gonna touch the watch, if that's all right.
translation.zh: ‎如果可以的话 我要拿一下手表

translation.en: -Go for it. -Let's see what comes in.
translation.zh:
‎-拿吧
‎-看看会有什么信息传来

translation.en: Okay. Got you. [smacks lips]
I have these two males that are coming through together
translation.zh: ‎有两位男性一起传信息过来

translation.en: that I have to talk about.
Any time people come through together, it means that
translation.zh:
‎如果有人一起传信息过来 ‎通常意味着
‎他们在另一个世界有某种联系

translation.en: they have some link or bond on the other side.
translation.zh:
‎通常意味着
‎他们在另一个世界有某种联系

translation.en: Like, I wouldn't connect with one. I'd have to connect with both.

‎我不会只与一位连结
‎而是得与两位都连结

translation.en: -[Cals] They're family. -Yeah.
It's interesting, the way it comes through.
translation.zh: ‎传来信息的方式真的很有意思

translation.en: One comes through younger, one older,
translation.zh: ‎一位年轻一些 一位年长一些

translation.en: in the way this is coming across, but they're both together.
translation.zh:
‎传来的信息是这样的
‎不过他们是一起的

translation.en: There is a reference to a contemporary that passed.
To explain this 'cause I see this symbolically, if I say that, it's someone on our level.
translation.zh:
‎解释一下 我说的当代人士
‎是指与我们同一时代的人

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. -We're gonna talk about their passing.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-我们要谈一下他们离世的情况

translation.en: He wants to know more about his heritage.
It's not just about me. It's about Tyler.
translation.zh: ‎这不光关系到我 也关系到泰勒

translation.en: He has a right to know, and I can't take that away from him,
translation.zh: ‎他有权知道 我不能剥夺他的权利

translation.en: nor would I ever want to.
Just finding out that Stella isn't your mother--
-[Tyler] Yeah. -Oh my God. It was a relief.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯
‎-神啊！简直就是松了一口气

translation.en: It was like a ton of bricks had been lifted off of me.
[voice breaks] Because I know I'm not related to her, I'm not like her.
translation.zh:
‎因为我知道我和她没有血缘关系
‎我不像她那样

translation.en: -You couldn't be more different. -I know. I know I'm a good person.
translation.zh:
‎-你们简直天差地别
‎-我知道 我是好人

translation.en: [Tyler] Yeah. Aw…
-No, it's okay, Tyler. I'm fine. -Come here and give me a hug.
translation.zh:
‎-不 没事 我没事
‎-过来 抱抱你

translation.en: You're such a good boy.
Oh, well, sometimes, when I behave.
translation.zh: ‎有时候是好孩子 我乖的时候

translation.en: [Tyler] I feel like my life is defined by moments of trying to help people find a sense of peace.
translation.zh:
‎我真的觉得我人生中最重要的事
‎就是帮助别人找到平静

translation.en: My main way is through readings.
For my mom, I want her to get as close as she can to a sense of closure.
translation.zh:
‎对我妈妈
‎我希望她尽量能够了却心结

translation.en: But after two years, my mom and I still don't know the truth.
translation.zh:
‎但是经历了两年
‎我和妈妈依然不知道真相

translation.en: How did she get in the hands of a criminal?
translation.zh: ‎她怎么会落入一个罪犯的手中？

translation.en: People ask me all the time in readings, "Are there evil people?"
translation.zh:
‎读心的时候 别人总是问我
‎有没有邪恶的人？

translation.en: There's certainly evil acts.
[Theresa] Stella, the woman who I actually thought was my mother,
translation.zh: ‎斯黛拉 我曾以为这个人是我母亲

translation.en: was a murderer.
